verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his body <S%H1320><s%> a swelling <S%H7613><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a scab <S%H5597><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a bright <S%H934><s%> spot, <S%H934><s%> and it becomes <S%H1961><s%> an infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his body, <S%H1320><s%> then he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests. <S%H3548><s%>

"And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the mark <S%H5061><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the body, <S%H1320><s%> and if the hair <S%H8181><s%> in the infection <S%H5061><s%> has turned <S%H2015><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> and the infection <S%H5061><s%> appears <S%H4758><s%> to be deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his body, <S%H1320><s%> it is an infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy; <S%H6883><s%> when the priest <S%H3548><s%> has looked <S%H7200><s%> at him, he shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the bright <S%H934><s%> spot <S%H934><s%> is white <S%H3836><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his body, <S%H1320><s%> and it does not appear <S%H4758><s%> to be deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the hair <S%H8181><s%> on it has not turned <S%H2015><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> [him who has] the infection <S%H5061><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> in his eyes <S%H5869><s%> the infection <S%H5061><s%> has not changed, <S%H5975><s%> [and] the infection <S%H5061><s%> has not spread <S%H6581><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> him for seven <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H8145><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him again <S%H8145><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the infection <S%H5061><s%> has faded, <S%H3544><s%> and the mark <S%H5061><s%> has not spread <S%H6581><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> him clean; <S%H2891><s%> it is [only] a scab. <S%H4556><s%> And he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> and be clean. <S%H2891><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the scab <S%H4556><s%> spreads <S%H6581><s%> farther <S%H6581><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he has shown <S%H7200><s%> himself to the priest <S%H3548><s%> for his cleansing, <S%H2893><s%> he shall appear <S%H7200><s%> again <S%H8145><s%> to the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

"And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the scab <S%H4556><s%> has spread <S%H6581><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>
"When <S%H3588><s%> the infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> is on a man, <S%H120><s%> then he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> to the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

"The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall then look, <S%H7200><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> there is a white <S%H3836><s%> swelling <S%H7613><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and it has turned <S%H2015><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and there is quick <S%H4241><s%> raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the swelling, <S%H7613><s%>

it is a chronic <S%H3462><s%> leprosy <S%H6883><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of his body, <S%H1320><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> he shall not isolate <S%H5462><s%> him, for he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

"And if <S%H518><s%> the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> breaks <S%H9457><s%> out farther <S%H6524><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> covers <S%H3680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> of [him who has] the infection <S%H5061><s%> from his head <S%H7218><s%> even to his feet, <S%H7272><s%> as far <S%H3605><s%> as the priest <S%H3548><s%> can see, <S%H4758><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [if] the leprosy <S%H6883><s%> has covered <S%H3680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his body, <S%H1320><s%> he shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> clean <S%H2891><s%> [him who has] the infection; <S%H5061><s%> it has all <S%H3605><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> [and] he is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
"But whenever <S%H3117><s%> raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> appears <S%H7200><s%> on him, he shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

"And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and he shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is unclean, <S%H2931><s%> it is leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

"Or <S%H176><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> the raw <S%H2416><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> and is changed <S%H2015><s%> to white, <S%H3836><s%> then he shall come <S%H935><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [if] the infection <S%H5061><s%> has turned <S%H2015><s%> to white, <S%H3836><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> clean <S%H2891><s%> [him who has] the infection; <S%H5061><s%> he is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
"And when <S%H3588><s%> the body <S%H1320><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> a boil <S%H7822><s%> on its skin, <S%H5785><s%> and it is healed, <S%H7495><s%>

and in the place <S%H4725><s%> of the boil <S%H7822><s%> there is a white <S%H3836><s%> swelling <S%H7613><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a reddish-white, bright <S%H934><s%> spot, <S%H934><s%> then it shall be shown <S%H7200><s%> to the priest; <S%H3548><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [if] it appears <S%H4758><s%> to be lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and the hair <S%H8181><s%> on it has turned <S%H2015><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is the infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy, <S%H6883><s%> it has broken <S%H9457><s%> out in the boil. <S%H7822><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> looks <S%H7200><s%> at it, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H369><s%> are no <S%H369><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> hairs <S%H8181><s%> in it and it is not lower <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin <S%H5785><s%> and is faded, <S%H3544><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> him for seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

and if <S%H518><s%> it spreads <S%H6581><s%> farther <S%H6581><s%> on the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is an infection. <S%H5061><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the bright <S%H934><s%> spot <S%H934><s%> remains <S%H5975><s%> in its place, <S%H8478><s%> and does not spread, <S%H6581><s%> it is [only] the scar <S%H6867><s%> of the boil; <S%H7822><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> him clean. <S%H2891><s%>

"Or <S%H176><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> the body <S%H1320><s%> sustains <S%H1961><s%> in its skin <S%H5785><s%> a burn <S%H4348><s%> by fire, <S%H784><s%> and the raw <S%H4241><s%> [flesh] of the burn <S%H4348><s%> becomes <S%H1961><s%> a bright <S%H934><s%> spot, <S%H934><s%> reddish-white, <S%H3836><s%> or <S%H176><s%> white,

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at it. And if <S%H2009><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> in the bright <S%H934><s%> spot <S%H934><s%> has turned <S%H2015><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> and it appears <S%H4758><s%> to be deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> it is leprosy; <S%H6883><s%> it has broken <S%H9457><s%> out in the burn. <S%H4348><s%> Therefore, the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is an infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> looks <S%H7200><s%> at it, and indeed, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> in the bright <S%H934><s%> spot, <S%H934><s%> and it is no <S%H369><s%> deeper <S%H8217><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> but is dim, <S%H3544><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> him for seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> If <S%H518><s%> it spreads <S%H6581><s%> farther <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is an infection <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy. <S%H6883><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the bright <S%H934><s%> spot <S%H934><s%> remains <S%H5975><s%> in its place, <S%H8478><s%> and has not spread <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> but is dim, <S%H3544><s%> it is the swelling <S%H7613><s%> from the burn; <S%H4348><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> him clean, <S%H2891><s%> for it is [only] the scar <S%H6867><s%> of the burn. <S%H4348><s%>
"Now if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> an infection <S%H5061><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> or <S%H176><s%> on the beard, <S%H2206><s%>

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the infection, <S%H5061><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> it appears <S%H4758><s%> to be deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and there is thin <S%H1851><s%> yellowish <S%H6669><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> in it, then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> it is a scale, <S%H5424><s%> it is leprosy <S%H6883><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of the beard. <S%H2206><s%>

"But if <S%H3588><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> looks <S%H7200><s%> at the infection <S%H5061><s%> of the scale, <S%H5424><s%> and indeed, <S%H2009><s%> it appears <S%H4758><s%> to be no <S%H369><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> in it, then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> [the person] with the scaly <S%H5424><s%> infection <S%H5061><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"And on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the infection, <S%H5061><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the scale <S%H5424><s%> has not spread, <S%H6581><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> yellowish <S%H6669><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> has grown <S%H1961><s%> in it, and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the scale <S%H5424><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%>

then he shall shave <S%H1548><s%> himself, but he shall not shave <S%H1548><s%> the scale; <S%H5424><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall isolate <S%H5462><s%> [the person] with the scale <S%H5424><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H8145><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"Then on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the scale, <S%H5424><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the scale <S%H5424><s%> has not spread <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> and it appears <S%H4758><s%> to be no <S%H369><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the skin, <S%H5785><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> him clean; <S%H2891><s%> and he shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> and be clean. <S%H2891><s%>
"But if <S%H518><s%> the scale <S%H5424><s%> spreads <S%H6581><s%> farther <S%H6581><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his cleansing, <S%H2893><s%>

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him, and if <S%H2009><s%> the scale <S%H5424><s%> has spread <S%H6581><s%> in the skin, <S%H5785><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> need not seek <S%H1239><s%> for the yellowish <S%H6669><s%> hair; <S%H8181><s%> he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

"If <S%H518><s%> in his sight <S%H5869><s%> the scale <S%H5424><s%> has remained, <S%H5975><s%> however, and black <S%H7838><s%> hair <S%H8181><s%> has grown <S%H6779><s%> in it, the scale <S%H5424><s%> has healed, <S%H7495><s%> he is clean; <S%H2889><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall pronounce <S%H2891><s%> him clean. <S%H2891><s%>

"And when <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> bright <S%H934><s%> spots <S%H934><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the body, <S%H1320><s%> [even] white <S%H3836><s%> bright <S%H934><s%> spots, <S%H934><s%>

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the bright <S%H934><s%> spots <S%H934><s%> on the skin <S%H5785><s%> of their bodies <S%H1320><s%> are a faint <S%H3544><s%> white, <S%H3836><s%> it is eczema <S%H933><s%> that has broken <S%H9457><s%> out on the skin; <S%H5785><s%> he is clean. <S%H2889><s%>
"Now if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> loses <S%H4803><s%> the hair <S%H4803><s%> of his head, <S%H7218><s%> he is bald; <S%H7142><s%> he is clean. <S%H2889><s%>

"And if <S%H518><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> becomes <S%H4803><s%> bald <S%H4803><s%> at the front <S%H6440><s%> and sides, <S%H6285><s%> he is bald <S%H1371><s%> on the forehead; <S%H1371><s%> he is clean. <S%H2889><s%>

"But if <S%H3588><s%> on the bald <S%H7146><s%> head <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the bald <S%H1372><s%> forehead, <S%H1372><s%> there occurs <S%H1961><s%> a reddish-white infection, <S%H5061><s%> it is leprosy <S%H6883><s%> breaking <S%H9457><s%> out on his bald <S%H7146><s%> head <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> on his bald <S%H1372><s%> forehead. <S%H1372><s%>

"Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at him; and if <S%H2009><s%> the swelling <S%H7613><s%> of the infection <S%H5061><s%> is reddish-white on his bald <S%H7146><s%> head <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> on his bald <S%H1372><s%> forehead, <S%H1372><s%> like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> in the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the body, <S%H1320><s%>

he is a leprous <S%H6879><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%> The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall surely <S%H2930><s%> pronounce <S%H2930><s%> him unclean; <S%H2930><s%> his infection <S%H5061><s%> is on his head. <S%H7218><s%>

"As for the leper <S%H6879><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has the infection, <S%H5061><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> shall be torn, <S%H6533><s%> and the hair of his head <S%H7218><s%> shall be uncovered, <S%H6544><s%> and he shall cover <S%H5844><s%> his mustache <S%H8222><s%> and cry, <S%H7121><s%> 'Unclean! <S%H2931><s%> Unclean! <S%H2931><s%>'

"He shall remain <S%H2930><s%> unclean <S%H2930><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> during which <S%H834><s%> he has the infection; <S%H5061><s%> he is unclean. <S%H2931><s%> He shall live <S%H3427><s%> alone; <S%H910><s%> his dwelling <S%H4186><s%> shall be outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> a garment <S%H899><s%> has <S%H1961><s%> a mark <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> in it, whether it is a wool <S%H6785><s%> garment <S%H899><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a linen <S%H6593><s%> garment, <S%H899><s%>

whether <S%H176><s%> in warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woof, <S%H6154><s%> of linen <S%H6593><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of wool, <S%H6785><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> in leather <S%H5785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H4399><s%> made <S%H4399><s%> of leather, <S%H5785><s%>

if the mark <S%H5061><s%> is greenish <S%H3422><s%> or <S%H176><s%> reddish <S%H125><s%> in the garment <S%H899><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the leather, <S%H5785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the woof, <S%H6154><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H3627><s%> of leather, <S%H5785><s%> it is a leprous <S%H6883><s%> mark <S%H5061><s%> and shall be shown <S%H7200><s%> to the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

"Then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> at the mark, <S%H5061><s%> and shall quarantine <S%H5462><s%> the article with the mark <S%H5061><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"He shall then look <S%H7200><s%> at the mark <S%H5061><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> has spread <S%H6581><s%> in the garment, <S%H899><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> in the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the woof, <S%H6154><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the leather, <S%H5785><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> the purpose <S%H4399><s%> for which <S%H834><s%> the leather <S%H5785><s%> is used, <S%H4399><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> is a leprous <S%H6883><s%> malignancy, <S%H3992><s%> it is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

"So he shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the garment, <S%H899><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> the woof, <S%H6154><s%> in wool <S%H6785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in linen, <S%H6593><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H3627><s%> of leather <S%H5785><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> occurs, <S%H1961><s%> for it is a leprous <S%H6883><s%> malignancy; <S%H3992><s%> it shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

"But if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and indeed, <S%H2009><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> has not spread <S%H6581><s%> in the garment, <S%H899><s%> either <S%H176><s%> in the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the woof, <S%H6154><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H3627><s%> of leather, <S%H5785><s%>

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall order <S%H6680><s%> them to wash <S%H3526><s%> the thing in which <S%H834><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> occurs, and he shall quarantine <S%H5462><s%> it for seven <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H8145><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"After <S%H310><s%> the article with the mark <S%H5061><s%> has been washed, <S%H3526><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall again <S%H310><s%> look, <S%H7200><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> has not changed <S%H2015><s%> its appearance, <S%H5869><s%> even though the mark <S%H5061><s%> has not spread, <S%H6581><s%> it is unclean; <S%H2931><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> it in the fire, <S%H784><s%> whether an eating <S%H6356><s%> away <S%H6356><s%> has produced bareness <S%H7146><s%> <S%H1372><s%> on the top <S%H7146><s%> or <S%H176><s%> on the front <S%H1372><s%> of it.

"Then if <S%H518><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and if <S%H2009><s%> the mark <S%H5061><s%> has faded <S%H3544><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it has been washed, <S%H3526><s%> then he shall tear <S%H7167><s%> it out of the garment <S%H899><s%> or <S%H176><s%> out of the leather, <S%H5785><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> from the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> from the woof; <S%H6154><s%>

and if <S%H518><s%> it appears <S%H7200><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> in the garment, <S%H899><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> in the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the woof, <S%H6154><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H3627><s%> of leather, <S%H5785><s%> it is an outbreak; <S%H9457><s%> the article with the mark <S%H5061><s%> shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> for the mark <S%H5061><s%> of leprosy <S%H6883><s%> in a garment <S%H899><s%> of wool <S%H6785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> linen, <S%H6593><s%> whether <S%H176><s%> in the warp <S%H8359><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in the woof, <S%H6154><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> article <S%H3627><s%> of leather, <S%H5785><s%> for pronouncing <S%H2891><s%> it clean <S%H2891><s%> or <S%H176><s%> unclean. <S%H2930><s%>
